title: DORA | DORA Guides
content: DORA Guides For a successful journey of continuous improvement—getting better at getting better!—you’ll need the right equipment. These guides, written by members of the DORA research project and friends from throughout our community of practice, offer advice from practitioners on how to apply DORA’s findings in your own unique context.

headings: H2: DORA’s software delivery metrics: the four keys
H4: Discover the essential measurements that can inform your ongoing journey of continuous improvement.
H2: How to enable your software delivery teams to innovate with generative AI
H4: A guide to innovating with generative AI.
H2: Value stream mapping for software delivery
H4: A guide to value stream mapping.
H2: How to transform your organization
H4: Find out about the importance of ensuring your people have the tools and resources to do their job, and of making good use of their skills and abilities.
H2: How to empower software delivery teams as a business leader
H4: A guide to facilitating the flow of value.
metadata.description: DORA is a long running research program that seeks to understand the capabilities that drive software delivery and operations performance. DORA helps teams apply those capabilities, leading to better organizational performance.
metadata.keywords: DevOps, Lead time, Deploy frequency, Change fail rate, MTTR, Time to restore, metrics, DORA
